      • ArrayCopy

        public static <T,U> T[] ArrayCopy(U[] original,
                                  int newLength,
                                  java.lang.Class<? extends T[]> newType)
        Wrapper around Java library array copy function.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type of new array.
        U - Generic type of original array.
        Parameters:
        original - Original array.
        newLength - Length of new array.
        newType - Type of new array.
        Returns:
        Copied array.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(java.lang.Object[] a,
                             java.lang.Object[] b)
        Determines whether two arrays are equal to each other. For them to be equal, their length's must be equal, they must be of the same class type, and each value in the ith position of each array must be equal.
        Parameters:
        a - First array to compare
        b - Second array to compare
        Returns:
        True if and only if the above conditions are met
